definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Last summer, a hailstorm damaged the ten mu of good land.
sentences.chinese: 冰雹毁坏了农作物，甚至打死了牲畜。

sentences.english: This area is hit by an average of about 5 hailstorms a year.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区平均每年遭受大约五次冰雹袭击。

sentences.english: There is golf-ball-size hail in New Jersey today.
sentences.chinese: 新泽西州今日下起高尔夫球大小的冰雹。

sentences.english: Only in the land of Goshen, where the children of Israel were, was there no hail.
sentences.chinese: 惟独以色列人所住的歌珊地没有冰雹。

sentences.english: The hailstorm is pelting against the roof.
If on Candlemas day it be shower and rain, winter is gone, and will not come again.
sentences.chinese: 如果圣烛节下冰雹和雨水，冬天已经一去不复返。

sentences.english: Also the Lord will use huge hailstones .
sentences.chinese: 主同时会用巨大的冰雹。

sentences.english: At this moment, hailstones happen to thump on the rooftops .
sentences.chinese: 此刻，突然下起了冰雹，乒乒乓乓地砸在屋顶上。

sentences.english: Only in the land of Goshen, where the people of Israel were, was there no hail.
sentences.chinese: 惟独以色列人所住的歌珊地没有冰雹。

sentences.english: Occasionally there are hailstorms in summer.
He hurls down his hail like pebbles.
Large hail was banging into cars and windows.
sentences.chinese: 大个儿的冰雹落入轿车中，落入窗户中。

sentences.english: How long do you think this hailstorm is supposed to last?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这场暴风冰雹会持续多长时间？

sentences.english: Think of the damage such large hailstones could do.
sentences.chinese: 想想这么大的冰雹会造成怎样的伤害。

sentences.english: Twisters are born in thunderstorms and are often accompanied by hail.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风在雷雨中诞生，并常伴有冰雹。

sentences.english: In Zhoukou, Henan Province, dozens of trees were uprooted and ripped apart by the strong storms.
sentences.chinese: 河南周口也遭遇特大冰雹，树木被连根拔起。

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
howling wind and torrential rain (idiom)/(fig.) difficult, dangerous situation
